title: Met office predicts light rain in Karachi today
text:
Met office predicts light rain in Karachi today | 0 0 
KARACHI: The Metrological office has predicted light rainfall in the metropolis and its surrounding areas today (Wednesday ). 
The weather department has informed that the maximum temperature tomorrow in Karachi would be 33 degrees centigrade, it further said that light showers are also expected in Islamabad, Chitral and Lahore. 
The department has said that the unexpected change of temperature is because of winds at South-Western part of the country. 0 0 Met office predicts light rain in Karachi today was posted in pakistan of Geo TV - https://www.geo.tv on March 29, 2017 and was last updated on March 29, 2017. This news story is related to Karachi, Karachi Weather, Pakistan, Pakistan News, Geo, Geo News, Weather Department. Permanent link to the news story "Met office predicts light rain in Karachi today" is https://www.geo.tv/latest/135897-Met-office-predicts-light-rain-in-Karachi-today . More From Pakistan:
